summary: Ambitious Qualified Dentist with excellent organisational and interpersonal skills. Dr. Malik, having had extensive experience in periodontics, implant dentistry and implant prosthodontics. After graduating in 2002 he cleared Australian Dental Council (ADC) Examination for Recognition and Licensing in Australia in 2004. He further Post Graduated (M.D.S) in Periodontics And Oral Implantology and worked with reputed Dental Institutes and Opinion Leaders in world of dentistry.

currentPositions.description: Special interests in Dental Implantology, led ME to extensive Implantology course including Surgical And Prosthetic Training With Multiple Implant Systems in 2005 ( Implant Study Group Bangalore). Trained with Advanced Prosthetics Including Implant Prosthodontics and crown and bridge in 2010. One of the first Asian to be trained with DSD (Digital Smile Designing) in 2012 from Christian Coachman and he Trained In Advanced Implantology In New York In 2016. Further has to my credit advanced diploma from Miami Medical And Research Institute In Implant Dentistry, Lisbon Portugal in 2017 . Exceptional achievement was to get Prof. Paulo Malo to his practice and train people from across the country in “All On 4” implant based treatment concept in dentistry. He is Chief Mentor of recognised courses in dental implantology under MIME (max institude of medical excellence). His prominent awards include –International College Of Dentist – Gold Award and Commadore J K Gupta Perio Award - Best National Case Report. Presented various papers and posters at national and international conferences along with publications and contributions in various journals and books. Publications include his interests in diverse treatment modalities in dentistry and include studies and exceptional clinical work.
currentPositions.title: Director And Head, Department Of Dentistry

message.text: Happy patients is the highest form of professional satisfaction!!The right skills teamwork combined with advanced technology and infrastructure makes your patients keep coming back 😀

"Get ready to embark on the Dental implants Journey of the Lifetime!
🌟
Basic to Advanced Dental implamtology courses with ImplantSwiss and AIM Academy. 
🌟
Guided by the expertise of Dr. Gaurav Malik, you'll uncover every facet of dental surgery and prosthetic modules, total 5 daya (3 days Surgical and 2 day prosthetic module).
✨️
And on addition 5-day dental odyssey, blending mastering the art with precision and flair.
✨️
But the adventure doesn't stop there! From the vibrant streets of Chandigarh to the exotic landscapes of Vietnam, join us for an epic educational and extravaganza!
✨️
Dive deeper into the realm of All-on-Six with immediate loading at the electrifying Vientam Scientific Session.  It's an immersive, tooth-tacular experience that promises to leave you smiling brighter than ever!✨

Enroll Today🎯
